name: RES_COMPONENT_LRR
description: This table contains discrete, component-based information and findings for this result.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the result (RES .1).

columns.name: RESULT_VALUE
columns.description: The value for the associated result component row.

columns.name: RESULT_UNITS
columns.description: The units for the associated result component row.

columns.name: RESULT_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment for the associated result component row.
